name: I Like You
description:
https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/i-you

There's a new girl in the class, and you had fall in love with her, show her your love by sending the greatest amount of paper plane letters as possible.

Made in the Global Game Jam 2018, Córdoba Argentina, by:

  • Agustín Clemente
  • Matías Kopp
  • Renzo Sartore
  • Mateo de Mayo
  • Alexis Fonzo
  • Érika Damiani
  • Juan Cabral
